content.heroIntro:
Welcome to BENIARO, an exclusive penthouse development in El Tesoro, Algorfa, brought to you by PROMOCIONES JOG. Situated in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after residential areas, BENIARO offers sophisticated living with stunning value. This modern 1-bedroom penthouse, spanning 57m², is priced from just €159,000—representing exceptional investment potential in a market experiencing consistent growth of 12% year-on-year.

Algorfa has emerged as a premier destination for international buyers seeking authentic Spanish lifestyle without compromising on modern amenities. BENIARO's strategic location in El Tesoro places you within minutes of the celebrated La Finca Golf course, pristine Guardamar beaches just 15 minutes away, and excellent healthcare at Hospital de Torrevieja. The international golf community thrives here, with English widely spoken throughout the resort area.

Completed by November 2026, BENIARO represents a smart choice for buyers seeking quality construction, proven developer expertise, and a location that balances investment growth with lifestyle excellence. Whether you're seeking a personal retreat or a rental investment with strong returns (€900 per week rental potential), BENIARO delivers exceptional value at 50% less than comparable coastal properties.

locationSection.intro: El Tesoro is a prestigious enclave within Algorfa, the gateway to Costa Blanca's golf and nature-loving community. This charming inland village maintains authentic Spanish character while offering cosmopolitan amenities and international accessibility. Algorfa's strategic position, just 30 minutes from Alicante Airport, makes it ideal for international residents and holiday investors. The area attracts a diverse demographic—from golf enthusiasts to families seeking quieter alternatives to crowded coastal towns. El Tesoro specifically is known for its peaceful residential setting, well-maintained infrastructure, and proximity to nature reserves. Property values have surged 12% annually, reflecting strong market confidence. The local community is welcoming, multilingual, and proud of Algorfa's reputation as a wellness and lifestyle destination. You'll find excellent restaurants serving both traditional Spanish cuisine and international favorites, boutique shops in the village center, and a calendar of cultural events.
